alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Bertie, northeastern Northampton, Hertford, northwestern Gates, southwestern Isle of Wight, and southeastern Southampton Counties, the City of Franklin and the southwestern City of Suffolk through 830 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms with heavy rain centered near Winton, or near Murfreesboro, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Rainfall 1 to 2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized flooding of poor drainage and low lying areas. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Ahoskie, Murfreesboro, Windsor, Courtland, Aulander, Holland, Chowan University, Suffolk, Winton, Cofield, Newsoms, Powellsville, Como, Hunterdale, Carrsville, Roduco, Sedley, Union and Severn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
